name: RTLToday
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
RTL Today is the exclusive news provider for Luxembourg with the latest news about Luxembourg, Europe and across the world.

Welcome to RTL Today on your Amazon Alexa. Follow the latest news in English on all your Echo Devices.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, play my Flash Briefing” or “Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?” to hear your flash briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
